bibl.title: Berenike 1996. Report of the 1996 Excavations at Berenike (Egyptian Red Sea Coast) and the Survey of the Eastern Desert. (CNWS Publications. Special Series. 3.)
bibl.biblScope: tabl., diagrammes, fac-sim., figg., cartes et 2 plans h. t.
bibl.note: Excavations and survey conducted by the University of Delaware and Leiden University, December 1995 - March 1996. - Pp. 193-198: Greek and Latin Textual Material, by A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT: 1. Greek Inscription. Dedication to Caracalla cum suis by an archer from Palmyra, 8 September 215 A.D.; - 2. Fragment of a Greek ostracon, mid-second century A.D.

bibl.title: Valerie Maxfield
bibl.note: C.R. par Valerie Maxfield, JRA 13 (2000) pp. 698-702 [concerne aussi: Steven E. SIDEBOTHAM and Willemina Z. WENDRICH (Edd.), Berenike 1994 (Leiden, 1995);
